attributes.action: cease the practice of creating punitive taxes designed to change the behaviour of the people and simply to use the tax system to raise revenue as it is required for legitimate expenditure.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is becoming increasingly common for the Government to create or increase taxes as a way of forcing a change in people's behaviour.

The function of taxes should be to raise revenue required to ease the lives of the British people and not to force them into changes in behaviour. If information and persuasion don't work, the Goverment should accept the will of the people who employ them.
